choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for 7 days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
### Assistant:

Here is your 7-day meal plan:
Day 1: Breakfast - Oatmeal with banana and blueberries; Lunch - Quinoa salad with avocado and black beans; Dinner - Baked fish with roasted vegetables.
Day 2: Breakfast - Eggs with spinach and tomatoes; Lunch - Chickpea salad with cucumber and feta cheese; Dinner - Grilled chicken with sweet potato fries.
Day 3: Breakfast - Overnight oats with strawberries and almond milk; Lunch - Vegetable soup with tofu; Dinner - Sweet potato noodles with peanut sauce.
Day 4: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with banana, spinach, and mango; Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and feta cheese; Dinner - Grilled fish with rosemary potatoes.
Day 5: Breakfast - Oatmeal with apples and cinnamon; Lunch - Chickpea salad with tomato and avocado; Dinner - Baked tofu with vegetables.
Day 6: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with banana, spinach, and peanut butter; Lunch - Vegetable soup with lentils; Dinner - Grilled chicken with sweet potato fries.
Day 7: Breakfast - Overnight oats with almond milk and blueberries; Lunch - Chickpea salad with cucumber and feta cheese; Dinner - Baked fish with roasted vegetables.
